objects.description: Hydraq creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can check for the existence of files, including its own components, as well as retrieve a list of logical drives.

external_references.description: Symantec Security Response. (2010, January 18). The Trojan.Hydraq Incident. Retrieved February 20, 2018.
Lelli, A. (2010, January 11). Trojan.Hydraq. Retrieved February 20, 2018.

objects.x_mitre_detection: {{LinkById|S0203}} creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can check for the existence of files, including its own components, as well as retrieve a list of logical drives.
